website_summaries.verdict: A quality blind with a lot of space and good function.
pros: Lots of room inside this blind
Can hold up to four people
Easy to maneuver and large enough that interior movement can be easily concealed
cons: The windows in the back of this blind are limited

customer_reviews.title: A well-designed blind
customer_reviews.text: This is just a great product. Well-constructed. Easy to set up and almost as easy to tear down. Plenty of room. There is no floor, but a tarp should work fine. The company b.c wisely included a well-made carry bag t h.g at actually includes shoulder straps for portability. Maybe the one thing I didn't like were the stamped metal stakes. I picked up some better quality after-market stakes. All good. Excellent visibility from inside whether for hunting, bird watching, or wildlife photography. And the price is fair.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Earl

customer_reviews.title: This review is for all the Trad bow hunters who is looking for a ground blind.
customer_reviews.text: I'm making this review to help out all the traditional bow hunters. This is a awesome ground blind for all traditional archers; long or recurve bow. Enough room for two traditional bow shooters plus equipment. Even better for rifle seasons; 4 people, plus equipment. Is a little heavy on the down side; about 35 plus lbs take it or leave it...using this blind you need to have another person to help you carry your bow and bow's equipment. With care, this blind will last for years. Hope this help you guys out my fellow archers.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, simple, innovative, and HUGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did a LOT of research before buying this blind, and I am incredibly satisfied with my purchase. It’s HUGE!!! but unlike other big blinds it doesn’t weigh a ton. It’s also super easy to set up. I love the hook and loop closure on the 180 window, the strap style adjustment of the gap, and the fact that me and my two kids hunted from this blind with plenty of room to spare! If you’re looking for a big blind for multiple people, stop looking and click buy now, because you found it!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Bag quality is the only thing lacking so far.
customer_reviews.text: Received it earlier than expected and so far the blind is awsome but have not used it yet just did a trial set up to familiarize myself with it and its features. The only problem I've had with it is the cary bag during the fitting of the steps to me it tore on the seam at the shoulders I can easily see it but if this happened in the field I would be understandably irritated at the poor quality of the bag material and its stitching but that's why I do trial runs before open season. Will update after it's been used through the season.
customer_reviews.author: dragonkiller1998

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Can we say big? Huge....enough for 3 adults to hunt in. Love the 180 degree window. Also the black out fabric is nice, cheaper ones have a black paint or vinyl that scratches, this is just black. Only thing I can recommend is a center pole as this thing is so big any snow weight and the top hub pops and the roof comes down. Good chance of breaking a rod or something if you try and push it back up with a snow load in it.
customer_reviews.author: Threeandcrazy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 seasons
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this blind for my guests for four seasons now, the material is starting to fade but the cloth is still resilient. Will touch up with a rattle can. Everyone LOVED this blind, the room it has and all of the stuff you can fit into it. More than enough room for a cheap easy chair, a couple of folding chairs, tripod, propane heater etc. the windows are perfect in height and function. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!!! It was a good blind for a year.
customer_reviews.text: This blind was awesome the first year I used it...I did leave it out in the elements but at this price point I figured it could take it for a year...boy was I wrong. It’s basically a white Camo now, not really going to help me in south Texas! Everything is dry rotted. I touch it and just crumbles! Biggest waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DWelch3

customer_reviews.title: Great blind
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a charity hunt club that I belong to. Myfloridahunter.com Sometimes we have handicapped kids come out, and it’s great. Easy for them to get into if they’re in wheelchairs, and plenty of room for mom or dad, and someone to film to be in there also. It’s been up for a year, under the tree canopy. A little faded but still in great condition. The material is also super thick. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: It self destructed
customer_reviews.text: I used this blind twice. I honestly liked the functionality and it seemed to be well constructed, but after only setting it up and taking it down twice it started falling apart. First, one of the loops that you stake it down with broke and then as I was setting it up the next time the sleeve that holds the rod just came unstitched. I would hope that it’s just a defect, but I won’t be be repurchasing another one. Amazon is taking care of the return and refund and I will be trying my luck on double bull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blind
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it easy set up room enough for two with plenty of gear or even three back to back put a little buddy heater in it . Like a flipping hotel in the woods also bought a orange top for gun Season . Doesn’t get any better then this back pack design nice straps
customer_reviews.author: Brent t

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it’s tough. 30 mph winds, I thought I was going to be blown away. Stood strong. Love the window system
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Tilley

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy the height and width of the blind
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the height and width of the blind. Plenty of room for two people and gear. The material, Ox Hide, is the best I have found. The two shooting ports up front are not for an adult as they are too low, but they would work for a child. It wasn't a deal breaker for me. I hunted with a friend in the Texas panhandle last year and that's where I first saw this blind. Decide then I needed to purchase one, and I'm really glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No pin holes.
customer_reviews.text: When I got the Big Ox I set it up in the basement under large lights to check for any pin holes, I couldn't find one pin hole. The blind is very sturdy and the black material in the inside is great. Can't wait to use it in 2018. Great blind, the best I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: TONY S. HERBERS

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality product. Only lasted 10 months before falling apart. Reached out customer service and they will not warranty item “because it was left out in weather”. It’s a outdoor blind!! Poor customer service. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ZoMan

customer_reviews.title: Best Blind on the market..... Period.....
customer_reviews.text: Wow Wow Wow, this is the best blind I have ever seen and used. We used it for the first time this past weekend, it is amazing all the way around. It rained and it was dry and worked perfect... I love it....Put up in minutes... Easy to work and well built.. Can't say enough about how awesome this blind is...
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and very effective as a hunting blind. Set it up in an area where deer cross and let it sit for a few days. The first day I hunted saw 30-35 deer as close as 10 feet away. They knew something was up but could not see me looking right at them. I get like a fly in the wall in someone’s dining room. The blind is very comfortable, extremely easy to set up, and very intuitive for using the various features. I’m about to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Margo Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: This is the highest quality blind I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: Shot 2 deer out of this myself. And since I was done so fast 2 other hunters used this blind successfully in the 1st season that I have had it. So if anyone is keeping track that is 4 deer in 2 weekends of hunting. Might be the best hunting gear I have ever bough next to my guns.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Olauson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: looks to be very well made: materiel is thick and heavy. Carry bag comes up to my chest and total carry weight is significant, but heavier material makes for more weight. Windows have a tab and elastic loop type setup which is very quiet and easy to use. So far I like it a lot.... if I can get it up the hill.
customer_reviews.author: tunafish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: After primos,cabelas, this product was the most for the money, was easy to setup and take down. It is very big, so it’s easy to shoot out of, windows are wide and the view is terrific. Price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best popup blind on the market. Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very nice blind
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to put up. Seems to be well made, it has plenty of room, and even after 4 straight days of rain the inside was dry. Very good visibility of the surrounding area.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: There is really nothing more that I can add to the other reviews of this blind... Its big. Well made. Has a lot of silent window flap configurations for any kind of shooting position, And it IS very heavy. This is definitely a back up the truck, drop it off, and drag it the last few yards to where you want to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Happy CamperTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pop up blind
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pop up blind. Very pleased with its functionality and performance. I shoot traditonal and shooting a 64” Longbow out of the Barronett Ox5 with no issues and have several more inches of clearance. In the video I was shooting a Bear Kodiak Magnum.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Kissinger

customer_reviews.title: Invisible inside
customer_reviews.text: This bind goes up easily, has an amazing amount of room and you are invisible inside. High quality, quiet material. I had a buck at 20 yards 3 hours after I put it up.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY  C LONERGAN DMD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Well Made Hunting Blind
customer_reviews.text: Well made and reenforced in the right places. Only suggestion would be to add a vent a top to let out the heat if needed. Amazon delivery it timely and it o take about 60 sec to set up. Easy to take down. I have not used it in a hunting situation yet but will be doing spring turkey hunting next year in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best blind I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how "heavy duty" these blinds are! I bought two for hunting Whitetail in Illinois this past Fall and just ordered a third one for next season. By far, the best blind I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Bill D.

customer_reviews.title: This blind is big
customer_reviews.text: The carrying bag arrived damaged, hard to pack this big blind with a damaged bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: J J  J

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blind. The size allows for two hunters and plenty of gear with worrying about invading each others space. I’m very pleased with the purchase and would recommend this blind.
customer_reviews.author: DonJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Blind out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is the single best blind on the market, no reason to go with anything else. Exceeded my expectations, incredibly satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Blind
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several blinds from Double Bull on down. This is by far the best blind I have ever owned. The size is perfect for my daughter and myself to sit all day. The window adjustments are ideal with adjustments possible on the top and bottom. We did leave this out for the firearm season and did not haul in and out. It withstood the weather like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: See below
customer_reviews.text: Great room, easy to set up and take down. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Hubby bought this and has been very pleased, heavy duty material will definite keep you warm and the wind out.
customer_reviews.author: Krst188

customer_reviews.title: It has a lot of room.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday. We have a cape style house and it took up the entire living room. He says it is well made, durable for a New York winter (upstate new York), and has a lot of room. He cannot wait to be out here in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Fleres

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This blind is awesome! The fabric is super thick and there's a ton of room inside. Only drawback is it is HEAVY!
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed blind
customer_reviews.text: I used this ground blind for deer hunting. This is a fairly large, well-constructed blind which has enough room for two hunters. Because of its size, I would suggest two people for setting it up. The blind gives good visibility and was stable in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blind
customer_reviews.text: Used it for whitetail hunting this past year (2019) and it was great. Tons of room, easy setup and take down process. I’m gonna get another one. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wunder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and rugged material
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality and room this blind has to offer. The door opening is a bit snug but overall I love the blind.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It would blend into any shit pile...
customer_reviews.text: This was obviously someone's last day on the job. Many of the poles were in the wrong spots and this resulted in them ripping through when we initially unfolded it. The instructions are an absolute joke as well.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Perry

customer_reviews.title: huge
customer_reviews.text: its huge !! plenty of room for multiple chairs and equipment
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Welles

customer_reviews.title: Great Blind
customer_reviews.text: This blind is bigger than my college apartment!! lol Great views, very tough material. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shoaf

customer_reviews.title: Best blind ive ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! Set it up in the house just to see how big it was and almost took up the whole space. Very roomy inside my husband is 6'3 and can completely stand up. Well worth the $!!
customer_reviews.author: amie

customer_reviews.title: This blind is by far the best I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This blind is by far the best I've ever purchased. Its a lot bigger than what you think easily 4 people could fit in this thing. I love it because it's so easy to put up and take down compared to other blinds. It is on the heavy side but it is big and is strongly built.
customer_reviews.author: TONYA

customer_reviews.title: very well made
customer_reviews.text: love the adjustability of the windows. very well made theres a lot of space in there
customer_reviews.author: Amy Caradonna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blind!
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy, well built. The adjustability of the window system is amazing and i couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: GlockMan1007

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Showed up as expected. In great condition. Bonus! It arrived a day before the tracking number said it would!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OX4 blind
customer_reviews.text: The blind is great way better then any other blind I’ve ever owned.very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Ox 5
customer_reviews.text: Great blind, lots of room. Going to be perfect to take the kids hunting
customer_reviews.author: Cory Scott

customer_reviews.title: COLOR DOES NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, and windows but VERY disappointed in color fading! It was a beautiful green but after 2 MONTHS it is almost white!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different blinds, but this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Corsair

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and ample shooting windows
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room for myself my son and two grand kids. Very sturdy and ample shooting windows. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: D Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size for two to three people easy set up will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality, can't wait to use it. Love the windows.
customer_reviews.author: John Leanna

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced junk.
customer_reviews.text: White dog turd. Opening day and rain. This thing leaks and has holes all over it. Was this made by a preschool class? Don’t expect to stay dry in this one. Quality? What quality? There isn’t any quality on this blind. Don’t forget your poncho if you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Frodge

product_meta.title: Barronett Blinds BX550BW Ox 5 Pop Up Portable 5-Sided Hunting Blind, Backwoods Camo
product_meta.description: Style Name:Barronett Ox 5 BackwoodsIntroducing the ox 5 hub blind from Barronett. Featuring oxhide fabric, a unique 2-layer bonded fabric unlike anything ever used on a portable ground blind. Oxhide maximizes concealment on the exterior with a soft, no-shine, and color rich camouflage layer, that is permanently bonded to an ultra-durable, waterproof, woven polyester interior layer which is the ultimate in durability. In addition, the black interior fabric layer creates a dull black backdrop to conceal movement that will never scratch, crack or Flake off. The ox 5 is a five-sided blind that has a deceptively large interior giving the Hunter a panoramic view and enough room to stay far away from window openings to keep movement concealed. The all-new fully adjustable window design opens from the center horizontally across 3 sides and silently slides to the desired width or height.
feature_bullets: THE DURABILITY OF OXHIDE FABRIC: Rugged no scratch black interior layer with a color rich fabric and soft, low sheen exterior layer.
SILENT SLIDE WINDOWS: Silent fully adjustable window system. Slide the window panel to any desired gap.
PENTAGON SHAPE: Five-sided design creates 70% more space. This massive footprint allows you to hunt further back to conceal movement.
TOUGH: Heavy duty poles and all metal ball and socket hubs.
CONCEALMENT: Includes ground skirt and brush holder

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars106 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
